author: malbouis
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a backport of PR #35277 for inclusion of new DDD Geometry tags for Run3 MC, as requested in https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4460.html

In particular, two new tags are included: XMLFILE_Geometry_120YV2_Extended2021_mc and TKRECO_Geometry_120YV2.

The differences wrt the previous GTs are shown below:

**2021 design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/120X_mcRun3_2021_design_v4/120X_mcRun3_2021_design_v5

**2021 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v6/120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v7

**2021 cosmics**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/120X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v5/120X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v6

**2021 heavy ion**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v5/120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v6

**2023 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/120X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v5/120X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v6

**2024 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/120X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v5/120X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v6


#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -l 11925 --ibeos -j4

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

backport of PR #35277
title: [120X] Include new geometry tags in Run-3 MC GTs
